# https://bluesura.github.io/ llms.txt

- [M.U.G.E.N. Reference](https://bluesura.github.io/): Comprehensive M.U.G.E.N. reference site for game development.
- [MUGEN State Controllers](https://bluesura.github.io/MUGEN/document/State/): Explore MUGEN state controllers for character animations and effects.
- [MUGEN Lifebar Customization](https://bluesura.github.io/MUGEN/document/Lifebar/): Guide to customizing MUGEN lifebars and settings.
- [M.U.G.E.N. Trigger Reference](https://bluesura.github.io/MUGEN/document/Trigger/): Comprehensive guide to M.U.G.E.N. triggers and functions.
- [MUGEN HitFallSet](https://bluesura.github.io/MUGEN/document/State/HitFallSet.html): HitFallSet controls falling state during hit motion in MUGEN.
- [M.U.G.E.N. P2MoveType Trigger](https://bluesura.github.io/MUGEN/document/Trigger/P2MoveType.html): Determines the MoveType of the closest partner in M.U.G.E.N.
- [MUGEN DefenceMulSet Guide](https://bluesura.github.io/MUGEN/document/State/DefenceMulSet.html): Detailed guide on MUGEN's DefenceMulSet state controller parameters.
- [M.U.G.E.N. Standing State](https://bluesura.github.io/MUGEN/document/State/S.html): Overview of the Standing state in M.U.G.E.N. with parameters.
- [M.U.G.E.N. Round States](https://bluesura.github.io/MUGEN/document/Trigger/RoundState.html): Overview of round states in M.U.G.E.N. game engine.
- [M.U.G.E.N. Lifebar Configuration](https://bluesura.github.io/MUGEN/document/Lifebar/Face.html): Configure lifebar display settings for M.U.G.E.N. characters.
